responses.rationale: The segment describes a past event (culling) and does not contain a bare negation.
The segment describes a worsening situation and increased risk, not a bare negation.
The segment describes continued outbreaks and endemic risk, not a bare negation.
The segment mentions 'question marks around effectiveness' and 'whether vaccinated birds can still spread', which express uncertainty/possibility, not a bare negation.
The segment describes securing vaccine doses and does not contain a bare negation.
The segment describes details of a vaccine deal and does not contain a bare negation.
The segment describes procurement details and does not contain a bare negation.
The segment describes the target recipients of the vaccine and does not contain a bare negation.
The segment describes other countries securing vaccines and does not contain a bare negation.
